item.title: The Vines Resort & Country Club introduces a new garden venue for meetings, incentives, conferences, and events
item.description:
Source: The Vines Resort & Country Club. The Pavilion. The Vines Resort & Country Club, located near Perth, Australia, has introduced “The Pavilion.” This new event space is a specially designed garden structure situated at the front of the resort, offering scenic views of the golf course and surrounding gardens. It’s an excellent choice for events such as conference gatherings or product launches. The open-air venue, capable of hosting 100 guests, has three sides open to the elements...

item.title: Etihad introduces the Dreamliner to Perth
item.description:
Etihad Airways has started using Boeing 787-9 Dreamliners for flights to Perth, Australia. These planes provide passengers with larger windows, improved air quality, spacious storage, and advanced technology for a more comfortable journey. Flight EY486, the first Dreamliner flight, arrived in Perth on June 2nd and was greeted with a water cannon salute. This daily service replaces the Airbus A330-200, increasing capacity by 14%, with Business Class seating up by 27%...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-introduces-the-dreamliner-to-perth/

item.title: Sage Hotel in West Perth has been opened by Silverneedle
item.description:
Source: Silverneedle. Sage Hotel, West Perth. SilverNeedle, a hotel group based in Singapore, has partnered with Australian Development Capital (ADC), a Perth-based real estate developer, to open a new Sage Hotel in West Perth. This A$35 million project marks the debut of the Sage Hotel brand in Perth, a city gaining popularity among Singaporean business and leisure travelers, and positions the brand within the upscale hotel market. Sage aims to provide a unique experience that reflects the local community and goes beyond standardized global hospitality...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sage-hotel-in-west-perth-has-been-opened-by-silverneedle/

item.title: TripAdvisor has announced the winners of the Travelers' Choice awards for world landmarks
item.description:
TripAdvisor, the popular travel website, has revealed the winners of its Travelers’ Choice awards for top global attractions. Now in their second year, the awards recognized 929 attractions, with a special highlight on the top 25. Asian and Middle Eastern landmarks secured four spots in the global top ten, while an Australian park earned a coveted place among the top ten parks worldwide. Top 10 World Landmarks Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/tripadvisor-has-announced-the-winners-of-the-travelers-choice-awards-for-world-landmarks/

item.title: SilverNeedle Hospitality has introduced its second Sage Hotel in Perth
item.description:
Source: SilverNeedle Hospitality. SilverNeedle Hospitality, based in Singapore, is expanding its upscale Sage Hotel brand in Perth, Western Australia, with a second location. This announcement comes just weeks after the brand launched with a hotel in Brisbane. Iqbal Jumabhoy, Managing Director & Group Chief Executive Officer at SilverNeedle Hospitality, stated that Sage Hotels are designed for a specific type of business traveler: one who wants a consistent and straightforward experience while working in new cities...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/silverneedle-hospitality-has-introduced-its-second-sage-hotel-in-perth/

item.title: Emirates introduces Airbus A380 to Perth route
item.description:
Starting May 1, 2015, Emirates will introduce its Airbus A380 aircraft to the Perth, Australia route. This upgrade from a Boeing 777-300ER on one of the three daily Dubai-Perth flights signifies Perth’s growth as a global destination. This change will increase capacity by 136 seats per flight and 1,904 seats weekly, highlighting Emirates’ dedication to travelers visiting Western Australia’s capital city. Barry Brown, Emirates’ Divisional Senior Vice President, Commercial Operations - East, emphasized the importance of Australia as a destination by highlighting this fifth Emirates A380 service in partnership with Qantas...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/emirates-introduces-airbus-a380-to-perth-route/
